Can we shed some light on the politics of Hiroshima/Okayama in the late 
=
1500s.... why did Kogen throw all his resources into dying with the 
Amago =
why the rest of the Fujii family were vassals of the Mori ?

   I understan=
d the principle of a family sending its members to 
different Daimyo and su=
ch... and of the honor and loyalty to one's 
master... but I am also wonder=
ing of any other less obvious and 
possibly less "fantasy-sounding" reasons=
 why the Fujii home base near 
Yoshii would fall to the Mori Army while....=
 within the Mori Army 
itself, you had Fujii commanders and Fujii shinobi/s=
amurai.

         Any insight would be awesome.

 Thank you.
